values.value:
SELECT Id, Booking__c, CP_Brokerage__c, Brokerage_Scheme_Name__c, Type_of_Client__c, Tower_Unit__c, Brokerage_Lookup__r.Brokerage_Type__c, Booking__r.Tower__r.Legal_Entity__c, Booking__r.Tower__r.Legal_Entity__r.RDS_Company_Name__c, Customer_Name__c, CP_Invoice_Clearing_L1__c, CP_Invoice_Clearing_L2__c, CP_Invoice_Approver_L2__c, CP_Invoice_Approver_L3__c, CP_Invoice_Approver_L4__c, CP_Invoice_Approver_L5__c, CP_Invoice_Approver_L1__c, Channel_Partner__c, Invoice_Amount__c, Project__c, CreatedDate, Brokerage_Lookup__r.Name, Booking__r.Name, Channel_Partner__r.Name FROM Brokerage_Invoice__c
WHERE Brokerage_Lookup__r.Brokerage_Type__c = 'Additional Brokerage' AND CreatedDate = THIS_MONTH AND Brokerage_Summary__r.Brokerage_Scheme__r.Ladder_Creation_Manual__c = false AND Booking__r.Tower__r.Legal_Entity__c != null AND Booking__r.Tower__r.Legal_Entity__r.RDS_Company_Name__c != null AND Channel_Partner__c != null AND CP_Brokerage__c = null
